mainPackage.constructions
Class Construction

java.lang.Object
  mainPackage.constructions.Construction
Direct Known Subclasses:
HouseConstruction
public abstract class Construction
extends java.lang.Object

A class that represents a construction and all its properties. Intended to be subclassed

Field Detail

name

private java.lang.String name
the name of the construction

nullConstruction

private static Construction nullConstruction
A private data member to hold the construction representing an invalid construction. This property should never be used explicitly as it may be null. A call to nullConstruction() should be used instead where the lazy instantiation is done.

indexForNextConstruction

private static int indexForNextConstruction

constructions

private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Construction> constructions

chromoRepresentation

private int chromoRepresentation
A property to hold the chromosome representation for the object

Constructor Detail

Construction

public Construction(java.lang.String theName)
             throws ConstructionException
A simple constructor.

Parameters:
theName - an alias for the construction. This will be used in the state visual representation.
Throws:
ConstructionException
Method Detail

nullConstruction

private static Construction nullConstruction()
A method that returns a construction that represents an invalid construction. The construction returned has a fitness of 0 whatever the tile it is attached to

Returns:
a construction representing an empty construction

affinityToTile

public abstract double affinityToTile(Tile tile)
A method that should calculate how good a tile is for a given type of construction.

Returns:
A float ranging from 0 to 1. A zero represents that the tile doesn't suit this construction.

toCromossome

public int toCromossome()
A method to pass a Construction object to a Cromossome representation

constructionWithCromossome

public static Construction constructionWithCromossome(int chromossome)
A method to get the construction that has a given chormossome sequence

Parameters:
chromossome - the chromossome sequence whose construction is to be retrieved
Returns:
the construction with the passed chromossome

resetConstructions

public static void resetConstructions()
A method that removes all previously used constructions and resets the chromossome representations

name

public java.lang.String name()
